title: I forget my Wi-Fi key and Web login password I can’t login my E586DS.
answer:
If you forget your Web login password, you needn’t to worry. Try to restore your E586DS as following step
1. Open the back cover of E586DS
2. Press and hold the RESET button until OLED screen is off then E586DS will restart, after E586DS has boot up all the password will be restored to default.


Notice: After restored E586DS all the user settings will be restored to default settings.
If you only forget your WiFi Key, try to set the new WiFi key in the “WLAN Basic Setting” page, input new WIFI key directly in WPA Pre Shared Key bar or select show password option the view the password
